item.description:
Get involved with Living Forgotten Realms, the first RPGA campaign for Dungeons and Dragons 4th Edition!

Module Core 3 - Sense of Wonder
DM: Dave K.
Mustering starts at 6 PM, Game starts no later than 6:30 PM

You are summoned to help a cleric of Gond Wonderbringer, who seeks the location of a lost temple to the Lord of All Smiths. Think of all the marvelous inventions, lost since the Spellplague came crashing down on the nation of Lantan, that might lie waiting to be rediscovered and brought back to the lands of Faer√ªn! A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in the Nelanther Isles for characters level 1-4.

Space is limited to 6 players. If you want to reserve a space, please visit http://www.warhorn.ne... Walk-ins are welcome, in case a player doesn't show up, but we can't guarantee you a space unless you sign up and receive a confirmation. RSVPing on this site is not enough.

You must bring a character created using the guidelines provided by Wizards of the Coast. You can find these at http://www.wizards.co...

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: Living Forgotten Realms @ Pandemonium
